slide.title: Harddrive Tweaking
slide.blurb: %hdparm% can be used to query and set hard drive parameters.
slide.example: % hdparm /dev/hda /dev/hda: multcount = 16 (on) IO_support = 1 (32-bit) unmaskirq = 1 (on) using_dma = 1 (on) keepsettings = 0 (off) readonly = 0 (off) readahead = 8 (on) geometry = 3876/240/63, sectors = 58605120, start = 0
